result.title: Help required with string algorithm -- (rolling hash/rabin karp)
result.content:
Hello everyone,I am new here and not a competitive programmer but a research scholar.I have just started research on Rabin carp algorithm.I am completely fine with theoritical knowledge but I don't know much coding.

I just found this code on rabin karp but could not understand few lines(not algorithm but more of cpp).Can anyone explain me so that I can try out algorithm myself.

struct rolling_hash {
	unsigned long long h1,h2;

	void initialize() {
		h1=0ll;
		h2=0ll;
	}

	void append(char a) {
		h1*=B1;h1+=a-'a'+1;
		h2*=B2;h2+=a-'a'+1;
	}

	bool operator <(const rolling_hash &a) const {     // these lines basically...what's going on here
		if(h1<a.h1) return true;
		if(h1>a.h1) return false;
		return h2<a.h2;
	}

	bool operator ==(const rolling_hash &a) const { // here too...
		return (h1==a.h1 && h2==a.h2);
	}
};
